name: LittleYogis
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This audio will cue toddlers and children to pause for a yoga moment: directing either a yoga pose, motion meditation, or breathing exercise. To provide parents with techniques that will help children develop mindfulness. 

The briefing will post weekly Monday mornings at 7 am
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
